Story: POST /cars returns error without an Authorization token
Description:
If the request does not include a User's API token, then the endpoint returns a 401.

It also does not create a Car.

The JSON it returns is an empty hash:
{}

Story: POST /cars returns error with Authentication token is not valid for a user
Description:
Given I have a user with an API token.
When I submit an API request with a token that does not match any user in the system.
Then the user returns a 401 status, JSON for an empty hash and does not create a Car.

Story: /makes API can return XML as well as json
Description:
A client would like to use our API but they can only consume XML.

You need to handle both XML and JSON from all of the /makes API endpoints.

The structure of the XML will be slightly different than the JSON. As an example, the /makes/:id XML will look like this:

<apiResponse>
 	<links>
 		<self href="/makes/1">
 	</links>
 	<make>
 		<id>2</id>
 		<name>Ford</name>
 	</make>
</apiResponse>

The /makes response will look like this:

<apiResponse>
 	<links>
 		<self href="/makes">
 	</links>
 	<makes>
	 	<make>
	 		<links>
		 		<self href="/makes/1">
		 	</links>
		 	<id>2</id>
		 	<name>Ford</name>
	 	</make>
 	</makes>
</apiResponse>

Story: /cars no longer sets/gets number of doors
Description:
There are still clients who are using the number of doors field so you should create a new version of the API so that those how are depending on the number of doors field don't break.

The new version of the api should not require users to specify a version number. If users still want to use the old API, they should be forced to specify a new version.
